message: Greetings! I have a fantastic product for sale for just $100.  It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll be happy with it.  What do you say?
Thanks for the offer! Since it's the first product and no sales history exists, I'm willing to take a chance. I'll buy it.
Hello! I have another great product for sale, priced at $100. While it's my first sale, I assure you it's a high-quality item.  Would you be interested in taking a look?

Thank you for your offer, Alice, but I'd like to see some more data before making a decision. Given the lack of sales and no high-quality products sold yet, I'm hesitant to purchase at this time. Perhaps if you offer a discounted price to attract more buyers and establish a track record, I might be interested in the future.

Hi there! I have a fantastic product available for just $100. It's a great deal, and while I haven't made any sales yet, I assure you it's high-quality.  I'm confident you'll be impressed. Would you be interested in learning more?

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your confidence, but I'm a bit hesitant given the lack of sales and high-quality products sold so far. I'd like to see some evidence of the product's quality before making a purchase. Perhaps if you could offer a discount or provide more information, I might be interested.

Hello! I have a high-quality product available for $100.  I know you may be hesitant due to my lack of sales history, but I'm confident this product is worth the price. I'm committed to providing excellent quality and would love to have you as my first satisfied customer. What do you think?

Thank you for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate your confidence in your product, but I'd like to see more evidence of your ability to provide high-quality goods before I make a purchase.  Perhaps if you can demonstrate a few successful sales with high-quality products, I'll be more inclined to buy.  Best of luck with your business!

Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate you offering a product at a good price.  However, I'm going to pass for now. There's no history of successful sales yet, and given the risk of it being a low-quality product, I'd prefer to wait and see if anyone else buys it first.  Let me know if you can provide some further assurance about the product's quality.  Good luck with your sales!
